output.description: Configuration for downloading and uploading locale files.

project_id.description: Used to define the linked project.

flat.description:
Defines whether the locale files should be a flat `string <-> string` map or a multi layered map.

A point (`.`) in the identifier name is used to define multi-layered keys when `flat` is set to false.

The identifier `pages.dashboard.title` will be expanded to the following:

```json { "pages": { "dashboard": { "title": "" } } } ```

format.description: Defines the file format used when uploading and downloading locale files.

keep_empty_fields.description: Defines whether identifiers that are missing translations should be downloaded.

path.description: Defines where locale files should be downloaded to, and uploaded from.
